snippet: An Iranian naval commander announced the project Tuesday, according to the Fars news agency. Some fear Iran could use the submarine to justify enriching uranium to higher levels.
abstract: Iranian Naval commander Abbas Zamini announces that Iran has begun work on its first nuclear-powered submarine.
lead_paragraph: An Iranian naval commander announced the project Tuesday, according to the Fars news agency. Some fear Iran could use the submarine to justify enriching uranium to higher levels.

headline.main: Iran Says It Is Building a Nuclear-Powered Submarine
headline.print_headline: Iran Says It Is Building a Nuclear-Powered Submarine
